Title: Lost in Space
Writer: Irwin Allen, Matt Sazama, Burk Sharpless
Actors: Molly Parker, Toby Stephens, Maxwell Jenkins, Taylor Russell
Plot: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fight against all odds to survive and escape, but they're surrounded by hidden dangers.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 5 wins & 17 nominations.
